>
> I'm improving the Col Dean Hartley Website, specifically t=
he page on the 1964 Barnsdall Sword Show put on by the Nanka Token Kai (htt=
p://home.comcast.net/~colhartley/Oriental/ArmsAndArmor.htm).  I am looking =
for additional photos of the exhibit itself (the catalog pictures are alrea=
dy on the page).  Fred Martin and Bob Haynes just about killed themselves p=
utting on a fantastic show and I want it to remain possible for those who w=
